titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Transgender Erotic Pulp Fiction Collection from the Series Transvestia
Transgender Erotic Pulp Fiction Collection from the Series Transvestia
titlestmt.author: by Beinecke staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Tuesday April 23, 2019 at 03:00

did.unittitle: Transgender erotic pulp fiction collection from the series Transvestia

repository.corpname: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

did.abstract: Erotic pulp fiction related to male cross-dressing.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The Transgender Erotic Pulp Fiction Collection from the Series Transvestia is the physical property of the Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University. Literary rights, including copyright, belong to the authors or their legal heirs and assigns. For further information, consult the appropriate curator.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Transgender Erotic Pulp Fiction Collection from the Series Transvestia. General Collection, Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Erotic pulp fiction related to male cross-dressing.
Some individual titles (see accompanying list) taken from cover.
All individual titles paperbound.
Some titles include personal advertisements.

controlaccess.subject: Cross-dressers -- Fiction
Cross-dressing -- Fiction
Transgender people -- Fiction
Bisexuals -- Fiction
Sex -- Fiction
Bondage (Sexual behavior) -- Fiction
Sexual dominance and submission -- Fiction
Erotic stories
Personals -- United States
controlaccess.genreform: Erotica -- New York (State) -- New York -- 20th Century
controlaccess.subject: LGBTQ resource
